invalidID.reason: This endpoint requires an ID. The ID you provided was invalid.

argumentError.reason: One of the arguments is incorrect or not present. Please check your request.

unauthenticated.reason: Unauthenticated request. Please log in first.

insufficientRights.reason: Unauthorized request. You do not have sufficient rights to access this endpoint.

nonExistent.reason: The endpoint requested ($url) does not exist.

invalidVerb.reason: This HTTP verb ($verb) is not supported for this endpoint ($url)

nonJSONRequest.reason: All endpoints only support JSON ($mime requested).

serverError.reason: Something went wrong while trying to execute your request.

inavlidEmailReset.reason: No such email is present. Please check your email.
